titleInfo.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3624, FRAUDULENT JOINDER PREVENTION ACT OF 2016

extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3624, FRAUDULENT JOINDER PREVENTION ACT OF 2016; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 29

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Fraudulent Joinder Prevention Act of 2016_Rule for consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 618, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3624) to amend title 28, United States Code, to prevent fraudulent joinder, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 180 noes, Roll No. 86, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 237 yeas to 180 nays, Roll No. 85. Consideration is expected to resume tomorrow, February 25th.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Fraudulent Joinder Prevention Act of 2016_Rule for consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 618, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3624) to amend title 28, United States Code, to prevent fraudulent joinder, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 180 noes, Roll No. 86, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 237 yeas to 180 nays, Roll No. 85. Consideration is expected to resume tomorrow, February 25th.
